LanguageData.QuestBanditCamp.label: 도적 캠프 정보
LanguageData.QuestBanditCamp.letterText:
{2}의 {1}, {0}의 메세지를 수신했습니다.

근처 캠프를 근거지로 삼은 도적들이 {2}의 상단을 습격한다고 하며, 우리가 도적단 캠프의 모든 포탑과 적을 파괴하길 원하고 있습니다.

성공한다면 관계가 상승하고 다음 보상을 받을 수 있습니다.

{3}

LanguageData.QuestDownedRefugee.label: !!incapacitated refugee opportunity
LanguageData.QuestDownedRefugee.letterText: {0} contacts you on radio and requests help. HECAP is wounded and unable to move. Without your help, HE will die within {1} days.\n\nIt may be dangerous there, so beware.
LanguageData.QuestPrisonerWillingToJoin.label: prisoner rescue opportunity
LanguageData.QuestPrisonerWillingToJoin.letterText: A prisoner being held by {0} has managed to steal a radio and call you!\n\nNAME is being held at a camp nearby under armed guard. Rescue HIM, and HE will join your colony. HECAP is a {1}-year-old {2}.
LanguageData.QuestPeaceTalks.label: peace talks opportunity
LanguageData.QuestPeaceTalks.letterText:
NAME, {0} of {1}, has sent us a message. HECAP wants to talk with us in a nearby location.

It could be a great opportunity to improve relations with their faction, but beware - a poor negotiator can cause more harm than good and even anger them.

The offer will expire after {2} days.
